"The  Accounts  Receivable  shown  on  the  balance  sheets  included  in  the  Financial Statement (subject to reserves for non-collectability as reflected therein) and all receivables acquired or generated by the Company since September 30, 2014 are bona fide receivables and represent amounts due with  respect  to  actual  arms  length  transactions  entered  into  in  the  ordinary  course  and  are,  to  the knowledge of the Company, collectable at their recorded amounts.  Any reserves for non-collectability have been reflected on the Financial Statement in accordance with GAAP and are consistent with past practice.  Except as disclosed in Schedule 4.10 or in the ordinary course, no such receivable has been assigned or pledged to any other Person."
